Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Nagle/Hyacinth St
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Nagle/Hyacinth St.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Nagle/Hyacinth St.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
